text emoji are likely same as lenny face or kawaii face. you can explore many faces through this free extension.

What is a text emoji?
Text emoji are made from a combination of text + emojis = text emojis. The text refers to a word that is explained by writing or speaking. Emojis As you know, emojis are a kind of digital image that we use on social media and messages to express our emotions and ideas.

( ͡♥ ͜ʖ ͡♥)

You can share these text emoji to your friends, relative etc. These emojis are easy to use on to your instagram, twitter and pinterest too.
